GSD.product_version: versions from v5.16 to before v5.19.2
GSD.description:
ASoc: audio-graph-card2: Fix refcount leak bug in __graph_get_type()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 7a63a8c253bf57dfd9fa3ee2a7f1a3727505f947, it was introduced in version v5.16 by commit c8c74939f791ccbbfff988aec5f929374dbef2a6. For more details please see the references link.
